name: Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar
description: A premier engineering and research institute offering undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs.

reviews.comment: Excellent institute with top-notch faculty and facilities. Highly recommended for engineering education.
Great learning environment. The faculty is highly knowledgeable and supportive.

name: Pandit Deendayal Petroleum University (PDPU)
description: A leading university offering undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, management, and humanities.

reviews.comment: Excellent university with a focus on research and innovation. Great campus facilities.
Good academic environment. Faculty is supportive and knowledgeable.

name: CEPT University
address: Kasturbhai Lalbhai Campus, University Road, Navrangpura, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380009
description: A renowned university known for its programs in architecture, planning, design, and management.

reviews.comment: Excellent university with a focus on design and planning. Faculty is highly experienced.
Great learning atmosphere. The campus has excellent facilities.

name: Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology (DA-IICT)
address: Gandhinagar-Ahmedabad Road, Near Indroda Circle, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382007
description: A premier institute offering undergraduate and postgraduate programs in information and communication technology.

reviews.comment: Excellent institute with a strong focus on technology and research. Faculty is highly knowledgeable.
Great learning environment. Campus facilities are top-notch.

name: Gandhinagar Institute of Technology (GIT)
address: Nr. Vadsar Airforce Station, Via Sargasan, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382423
description: An engineering college offering undergraduate and postgraduate programs in various engineering disciplines.

reviews.comment: Good institute with experienced faculty. Campus infrastructure is decent.
Decent learning environment. Could improve on industry exposure for students.

name: National Institute of Fashion Technology (NIFT), Gandhinagar
address: GH-0 Circle, Infocity Road, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382007
description: A premier fashion institute offering undergraduate and postgraduate programs in fashion design, technology, and management.

reviews.comment: Excellent institute for fashion education. Faculty is highly experienced.
Great learning atmosphere. Campus facilities are top-notch.

name: Gandhinagar National Law University (GNLU)
address: Attalika Avenue, Knowledge Corridor, Koba, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382426
description: A prestigious law university offering undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in law and legal studies.

reviews.comment: Excellent university for legal education. Faculty is highly knowledgeable.
Great learning environment. The campus has excellent facilities.

name: Gujarat Forensic Sciences University (GFSU)
address: Sector 9, Near Police Bhavan, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382007
description: A specialized university offering undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in forensic science and allied fields.

reviews.comment: Excellent university with a focus on forensic science. Faculty is highly experienced.
Good learning atmosphere. The campus has modern facilities.

name: Gujarat Technological University (GTU)
address: Nr. Vishwakarma Government Engineering College, Nr. Visat Three Roads, Sabarmati-Koba Highway, Chandkheda, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 382424
description: A state university offering undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, management, and pharmacy.

reviews.comment: Good university with a wide range of programs. Faculty is knowledgeable.
Decent learning environment. Campus facilities could be improved.
